name: AnimatorRetargetingMode
type: enum
summary: |
  Animation Retargeting setting.
description: |
  The AnimatorRetargetingMode Enum describes the setting for Animation
  Retargeting. Retargeting adapts animations to various character rigs based on
  their proportions.
code_samples: []
tags: []
deprecation_message: ''
items:
  - name: Default
    summary: |
      Retargeting in default state, opt-in initially but subject to change.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Disabled
    summary: |
      Retargeting disabled.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Enabled
    summary: |
      Retargeting enabled.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''"
